name: Scary Cartoon Cat & Dog Attack
description: It's a story of cat. His wife was murdered by the dog. From that day cat is killing all the dogs. He has a dog as a guard. One day Scary cat capture our dog. When we went in Scary cat's house to rescue our dog but we became hostage by the scary cat's guard. We now are in the Scary cat's house. We have to save our life before Cat and his guard dog kill us. Enjoy the Good story and survive. Additionally There is another shooting mod as as free style mod. Enjoy shooting and kill Scary cat and Scary Dog. Give us your feedback so we can make better game for you.
